methodology: Web searches confirmed real incidents that match the claimed events. Entries corrected with verified details.

original_claimed.outcome: Shot during home raid, critical condition

corrected_entry.outcome: ICE/CBP agents fired two shots into passenger side of work truck during enforcement operation. Longoria's 18-year-old son narrowly missed. DHS claims driver struck two officers.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Original entry had wrong victim name and date. Real incident involved Francisco Longoria on August 16, 2025.

corrected_entry.outcome: ICE raided construction site in Uptown Charlotte on North Tryon Street. Workers detained during tall building construction project.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real raid occurred June 13, 2025 (not April). Later Operation Charlotte's Web in November 2025 detained 250+.

corrected_entry.outcome: Operation Buckeye: 214+ detained December 17-23 including restaurant workers. 80% Latino, 2 US citizens wrongfully detained.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real operation was 'Operation Buckeye' with 214+ detained, not 33 at food distribution center.

original_claimed.outcome: US citizen detained 72 hours, sued DHS

corrected_entry.outcome: Georgia Army veteran (7th Infantry Division, served in Germany) detained at Stewart Detention Center after traffic stop. Non-citizen who lived in US 52 years. Policy change removed protections for veterans.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real case involved Godfrey Wade, not Marcus Williams. Wade was a non-citizen veteran, not a US citizen.

corrected_entry.outcome: Died at Northwest ICE Processing Center in Tacoma. Senator Murray requested audit of ICE health care services after death.

alternative_case.note: Ethiopian detainee death occurred in Arizona

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Original combined Ethiopian death (Arizona) with Tacoma facility. Charles Leo Daniel died at Tacoma in March 2025.

corrected_entry.outcome: Federal agents used pepper spray and rubber bullets against protesters at ICE field office. Person filming in public space was attacked. Elderly woman shoved to ground by federal agent.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real incident was in Durango (not Denver) on October 29-30, 2025. Victim name unknown but incident occurred.

corrected_entry.outcome: ICE raids reported at apartment complexes in Phoenix metro area. Social media reported raids near 43rd Avenue and McDowell Road. 6,000+ arrests in Arizona FY2025.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: General activity confirmed but specific '42 detained' not verified. Keep with qualified language.

corrected_entry.outcome: Apartment complex raids reported in Indianapolis area. Nearly 1,400 arrests in Indiana since Jan 20, 2025 (80% increase over prior year). Protestor testimony at Statehouse confirmed apartment raids.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Apartment raids in Indianapolis confirmed by protestor testimony. Specific date and count not verified.

corrected_entry.outcome: Agent-involved shooting on Green Street during human smuggling investigation. Border Patrol agents assigned to Laredo Sector and other law enforcement agencies involved.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real CBP shooting occurred October 23, 2025 (not July 15). Victim name unknown - original name fabricated. Incident involved human smuggling investigation, not foot pursuit.

corrected_entry.outcome: Border Patrol conducted raids in Kern County affecting vineyard and citrus workers. Largest immigration enforcement operation in Central Valley in years. Acres of orange fields and vineyards sat unpicked as workers stayed home.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Real raids occurred in Kern County (not Fresno) in January 2025. Specific '93 detained at grape facility' unverified - changed to 'unknown'. Fresno Farm Bureau CEO confirmed no direct raids in Fresno County itself.

original_claimed.outcome: Immigrant tased multiple times by ICE agents during arrest

corrected_entry.outcome: Jamaican immigrant McIntosh, who overstayed B2 tourist visa by 3+ years, was involved in 3 hit-and-runs. Officer Mathers attempted to detain him. McIntosh assaulted her, striking her multiple times. She deployed taser but he removed probes and continued attacking until bystanders intervened. Officer injured, McIntosh arrested.

corrected_entries.correction_notes: Original entry completely reversed the facts. Real incident: immigrant McIntosh assaulted Officer Mathers during hit-and-run stop; she tased him in self-defense. Entry incorrectly portrayed it as ICE agent violence against immigrant.

confirmed_fabricated.reason: No evidence of 'Roberto Galvan' US citizen detained in El Paso. Similar Galvan Sanchez case exists but different details.
No evidence of 'Jennifer Nguyen' US citizen wrongfully detained in Des Moines. Ian Roberts case exists but he was NOT a US citizen.
searches_performed: ICE wrongful detention Iowa Des Moines US citizen 2025

confirmed_fabricated.reason: No evidence of ICE protest with pepper spray in Oklahoma City. OKC protests were reported as peaceful.
searches_performed: ICE protest Oklahoma City pepper spray 2025

confirmed_fabricated.reason: No evidence of 'Ahmad Hassan' US citizen detained in Detroit/Dearborn. Heavy ICE activity in Michigan but no matching case.
searches_performed: ICE detention Dearborn Detroit US citizen 2025

confirmed_fabricated.reason: Mike Connolly IS a real MA state representative involved in ICE activism, but NO evidence he was ever arrested.
confirmed_fabricated.recommendation: DELETE - fabricates incident with real person

confirmed_fabricated.reason: No evidence of Border Patrol/ICE shooting in Albuquerque, New Mexico in 2025 or 2026.
searches_performed: Border Patrol shooting Albuquerque New Mexico 2025 2026

confirmed_fabricated.reason: No evidence of ICE church detention involving 'Pastor Michael Thompson' in Greenville, South Carolina.
searches_performed: ICE church arrest Greenville South Carolina pastor 2025

summary.recommendation: Restore 11 corrected entries with verified data. Delete 7 confirmed fabricated entries.
summary.final_update: 2026-01-27 - Added T4-058 (Nashville taser - real incident with Tarfari McIntosh assaulting officer). Also added T2-SA-005 and T3-067.
